title: TechPulse AI - Conversation 10: NotebookLM: Research Workflows
description: NotebookLM, a Google AI tool designed to enhance research and content creation by analyzing uploaded documents like PDFs, text files, Google Drive items, website links, and YouTube videos.

title: TechPulse AI - Conversation 11: GitHub's AI Vision: From Code Completion to Intelligent Agents
description: AI hosts discuss a conversation with GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke, exploring GitHub's advancements in AI-powered developer tools, particularly Copilot and its evolving capabilities.

title: TechPulse AI - Conversation 12: Evaluating AI Cyberattack Capabilities
description: This paper from Google DeepMind introduces a novel framework for evaluating how emerging AI capabilities could enhance cyberattacks.

title: TechPulse AI - Conversation 13: Juliet Schor: The Case for a 4-Day Work Week
description: Economist Juliet Schor argues for a widespread adoption of a four-day work week.

title: TechPulse AI - Conversation 14: Brain Mapping of Natural Language with a Unified Acoustic-to-Language Model
description: This research introduces a unified computational model that bridges acoustic input, spoken language, and linguistic meaning to understand the neural processing of everyday conversations.

title: TechPulse AI - Conversation 15: Mathematics of Machine Learning: Binary Classification and Beyond
description: These lecture notes from an MIT course on the Mathematics of Machine Learning explore the theoretical underpinnings of various machine learning techniques.

title: TechPulse AI - Conversation 16: Information Theory: Entropy, Divergence, and Mutual Information
description: This Oxford Mathematics lecture introduces information theory, focusing on the mathematical understanding of communication.

title: TechPulse AI - Conversation 17: Model Context Protocol (MCP): Explained
description: AI hosts introduce the Model Context Protocol (MCP), a new standard designed to streamline the integration of Large Language Models (LLMs) with external tools.
